meanings.definition: A taxonomic category ranking below a phylum and above a class.
meanings.sent1: In biology class, we learned about the subphylum of animals.
meanings.sent2: The subphylum of insects includes beetles, butterflies, and ants.
meanings.sent3: The subphylum of birds decided to have a party to celebrate their classification.
meanings.sent4: The subphylum of fish swam together in perfect harmony, like a well-organized orchestra.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the subphylum of reptiles revealed a diverse and fascinating world.

meanings.definition: A group of related organisms within a phylum.
meanings.sent1: The subphylum of mammals includes primates, rodents, and carnivores.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the subphylum of plants to understand their evolutionary relationships.
meanings.sent3: The subphylum of flowers decided to compete in a beauty contest.
meanings.sent4: The subphylum of trees stood tall and proud, like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the subphylum of fungi revealed a hidden network of interconnected species.
